description: This file defines the AgnoCliConfig class, which manages user data, workspace configurations, and related settings for the 'agno' CLI tool. It includes methods for setting and clearing user info, managing active workspaces, adding, updating, deleting workspace configurations, and saving/loading the configuration state.

classes.name: AgnoCliConfig
classes.description: Manages user data, workspace configurations, and CLI settings for the 'agno' CLI tool, including user management, workspace management, and configuration persistence.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the AgnoCliConfig with optional user, active workspace directory, and workspace configuration map.

methods.name: user
methods.description: Setter for the current user; updates user info and clears cache if user changes.

methods.name: clear_user_cache
methods.description: Clears cached user and workspace data.

methods.name: active_ws_dir
methods.description: Getter for the active workspace directory.

methods.name: available_ws
methods.description: Returns a list of available workspace configurations.

methods.name: _add_or_update_ws_config
methods.description: Creates or updates a workspace configuration based on provided parameters.

methods.name: add_new_ws_to_config
methods.description: Adds a new workspace configuration to the CLI config.

methods.name: create_or_update_ws_config
methods.description: Creates or updates a workspace configuration and optionally sets it as active.

methods.name: get_ws_config_by_dir_name
methods.description: Retrieves a workspace configuration by directory name.

methods.name: get_ws_config_by_path
methods.description: Retrieves a workspace configuration by its root path.

methods.name: get_active_ws_config
methods.description: Retrieves the currently active workspace configuration.

methods.name: save_config
methods.description: Saves the current CLI configuration to disk.

methods.name: from_saved_config
methods.description: Loads the CLI configuration from disk.

methods.name: print_to_cli
methods.description: Prints the current configuration details to the CLI.
